TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示儲存在 中之 物件的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects stored in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A儲存物件，表示子項目的父代在控制項。A stores objects that represent subitems of a parent in the control. 子項目只會顯示在控制資料行中的指定時屬性控制及何時屬性控制設為 。Subitems are only displayed in a control when columns are specified in the property of the control and when the property of the control is set to . 中的子項目順序決定子項目會顯示在資料行控制項。The order of subitems in the determines the columns the subitems are displayed in the control. 有數種方法來加入至集合的子項目。There are a number of ways to add subitems to the collection. 方法會將單一至集合。The method adds a single to the collection. 若要加入集合中的子項目數目，您建立的陣列物件，並將它傳遞給方法。To add a number of subitems to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果您想要插入集合中的特定位置的子項目，您可以使用方法。If you want to insert a subitem at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要移除的子項目，您可以使用方法或方法，如果您知道子項目位於集合中的何處。To remove subitems, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the subitem is located in the collection. 方法可讓您移除而不是使用集合中的所有子項目方法一次移除單一子項目。The method enables you to remove all subitems from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single subitem at a time. 方法和屬性的加入和移除子項目，除了也提供方法來尋找集合中的子項目。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing subitems, the also provides methods to find subitems in the collection. 方法可讓您判斷是否是集合的成員。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道子項目位於集合中，您可以使用方法，以判斷集合中子項目的位置。Once you know that the subitem is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the subitem is located in the collection.

summary.span: 將子項目加入至子項目的集合。

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection of subitems.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem/ListViewSubItem Add(string text) cil managed
Public Function Add (text As String) As ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem

param.name: text
param.span: 要顯示的子項目文字。

span.span: The text to display for the subitem.

summary.span: 利用指定文字將子項目加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection with specified text.
The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法可讓您將加入集合中的子項目，藉由指定子項目的文字。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 呼叫此方法時，新建立使用指定的文字。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 您可以接著使用，由這個方法，以設定屬性和呼叫方法來管理子項目。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果您已經有的現有，您想要加入至集合，您可以使用的版本方法接受做為參數或使用方法，如果您想要新增特定的子項目在集合中的位置。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position within the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立有三個控制項指定的物件和三個每個項目所指定的物件。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此範例也會建立物件詳細資料檢視中顯示的子項目。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 兩個物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像物件。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 這些物件加入至和屬性。These objects are added to the and properties. 此範例會使用下列屬性建立控制項：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 這個範例需要您加入的程式碼並呼叫建構函式或在表單上的另一種方法從範例中所建立的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 這個範例也會需要映像名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法，以加入現有至集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 這個方法通常用來重複使用現有的子項目，從其他物件。This method is typically used to reuse existing subitems from other objects. 加入至集合的項目插入清單的結尾。Items that are added to the collection are inserted at the end of the list. 若要插入集合中特定位置中的項目，請使用方法。To insert an item into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 如果您想要新增現有的陣列物件，您可以使用新版方法可接受的陣列做為參數的物件。If you want to add an array of existing objects, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter.

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection with specified text, foreground color, background color, and font settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法可讓您將加入集合中的子項目，藉由指定子項目的文字。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 此外，這個版本的方法可讓您指定初始的前景色彩、 背景色彩和子項目文字的字型。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the initial foreground color, background color, and font of the subitem text. 呼叫此方法時，新建立使用指定的文字。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 您可以接著使用，由這個方法，以設定屬性和呼叫方法來管理子項目。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果您已經有的現有，您想要加入至集合，您可以使用的版本方法接受做為參數或使用方法，如果您想要新增特定的子項目集合中的位置。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，子項目使用的前景色彩、 背景色彩和父項目針對指定的字型。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 設定屬性設`false`以防止覆寫的子項目樣式的父項目樣式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法將字串的陣列加入至集合，其中每個集合中的字串表示的新子項目的文字。You can use this version of the method to add an array of strings to the collection, where each string in the collection represents the text of a new subitem. 您可以使用另一個版本方法可接受字串陣列做為參數來指定前景色彩、 背景色彩和字型要加入的每個項目。You can use the other version of the method that accepts an array of strings as a parameter to specify the foreground color, background color, and font for each item being added. 如果您想要重複使用現有物件並將它們新增至集合，您可以使用的版本方法可接受的陣列做為參數的物件。If you want to reuse existing objects and add them to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter. 如果您想要新增單一，使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 您也可以使用方法，如果您想要新增單一集合中的特定位置。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個版本的方法將字串的陣列加入至集合，其中每個集合中的字串表示的新子項目的文字。You can use this version of the method to add an array of strings to the collection, where each string in the collection represents the text of a new subitem. 此外，這個版本的方法可讓您指定的前景色彩、 背景色彩和字型的每一個子項目。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the foreground color, background color, and font for each subitem. 您可以使用另一個版本接受字串陣列做為參數，如果您不想指定前景色彩、 背景色彩和字型設定每一個子項目的的方法。You can use the other version of the method that accepts an array of strings as a parameter if you do not want to specify foreground color, background color, and font settings for each subitem. 如果您想要重複使用現有物件並將它們新增至集合，您可以使用的版本方法可接受的陣列做為參數的物件。If you want to reuse existing objects and add them to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter. 如果您想要新增單一，使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 您也可以使用方法，如果您想要新增單一集合中的特定位置。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，子項目使用的前景色彩、 背景色彩和父項目針對指定的字型。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 設定屬性設`false`以防止覆寫的子項目樣式的父項目樣式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.
